column3: News;By Sok Sophean.  Kampong Speu: ------ Police have arrested seven suspects aged between 17 and 22 years old in Loeung Sangker Village
column6: Kampong Speu Province. The arrests took place on the evening of September 9.------Sources added that
column8: the group had committed a series of snatch thefts around Chbar Morn town.------Three motorcycles were also seized.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/259135------http://www.rasmeinews.com/%E1%9E%83%E1%9E%B6%E1%9E%8F%E1%9F%8B%E1%9E%81%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%9B%E1%9E%BD%E1%9E%93%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%87%E1%9E%93%E1%9E%9F%E1%9E%84%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%9F%E1%9F%90%E1%9E%99%E2%80%8B%E1%9F%A7%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%93/------
